forageables.recipe: Mix fresh dandelion leaves tossed with olive oil, lemon juice or vinegar, black pepper, and salt. Add tomatoes, carrots, onions, and other fruits, veggies and herbs to taste.
forageables.name: Dandelion

forageables.recipe: Steep fresh or dry leaves in hot water for 2-5 minutes to make a tea of desired strength.
forageables.name: Stinging Nettle
